bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld, compact design, integrated headset, rack eyelets

KMC X9 nickel plate, reusable Missing Link
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Espoir Sport w/ double BlackBelt, 60 TPI, wire bead, 700x25c
